original_title: Bwana Jogoo: The Ballad of Jessy Gitta
overview: The music documentary "Bwana Jogoo: The Ballad of Jessy Gitta" tells the story of Jessy Gitta Kasirivu, a well-known Ugandan musician who, in the early morning of August 4, 1974, gets violently arrested by Idi Amin's infamous State Research Bureau (SRB) agents.
title: Bwana Jogoo: The Ballad of Jessy Gitta
